OnConnect.AddIRCMessage: @Clara, are you okay???
What just happened?
Omicron tried to set you up just like me
I prevented the upload to the FBI servers
He made some files that can compromise you
But I am innocent
I know that, but we tampered inside of EnTech
And I think that Omicron can place your tracks on some criminal servers
Same happened to me 2 months back
Yeah...
We need to drop the case for some time, this is too dangerous for both of us
He will make us do something that will turn us into monsters or will kill us
But he is a big danger for everyone
I know, but we don't have anything to begin with, he is most probably gone dark again
I could've get his location file, but I can't sacrifice you or anybody else
We should just stay out of it for a while
Just to remain dignity and not to fall in the pit of vengeance
I know you made some questionable actions while you were undercover
But now I believe that your soul is still in right place
You are right, sacrifices won't get us anywhere except his traps
But there is gotta be something we can do!
I am out of ideas, maybe he left something on your PC?
Let me check...
I think that he downloaded a few of my files with help of the EnSecBreach.dll
Maybe I can find an address where data were transmitting to
Be careful there
I think I got it
But I don't think that this is his real PC
Most probably a dummy with a trap
So what should we do?
Look, he tried to manipulate you for a long time
To make you a bad person
And so I would refuse to help you
That's his plan according to my researches
Why does he want me to turn vile?
Maybe he looks for successor
Don't know for sure
The point is, he awaits you
Maybe you can try to get to him while I will look for any security breaches
So I am the bait, huh?
Yep, I think it is only way to get to him now
I will give you the link and you should delete everything there
That will attract him and most probably he will attack
While both of you are busy, I will look for a way to get to his real PC
I guess it is only way
Be careful, Cypher
!ATTACHMENT:link#%#Omicron's PC#%#40.15.214.30
